TEI.2.document_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1922: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1928), 3 vols., Vol 2, pp. 407

barker_notes.barker_summary: James Austin to Francis F. Wells, June 4, 1830. Doctor's bill.
barker_notes.barker_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1919: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1924), 3 vols., Vol 1, Part 2, pp. 407

text.body:
*div1 type="summary"* *p*James Austin to Francis F. Wells, June 4, 1830. Doctor's bill.*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p**person_mentioned*James Austin*/person_mentioned* To *person_mentioned*Francis F Wells */person_mentioned* Dr*/p*
*p**date_mentioned n="06-01-1830">June 1st*/date_mentioned* Visit to *person_mentioned*Mr Bells*/person_mentioned* prescription etc__________________________ $2.00*/p*
*p*2nd Visit to *person_mentioned*Mr Bells*/person_mentioned* prescription Emetic and staying all day___ 5.00*/p*
*p*3rd Attention through day and night at my *location_mentioned*house*/location_mentioned*_______________ 5. 00*/p*
*p*4th Attention through day and night__________________________ 5.00*/p*
*p*$17.00*/p* *p**date_mentioned n="xx-xx-1830">1830*/date_mentioned* Recd, payment*/p*
*p**person_mentioned*Francis F Wells*/person_mentioned**/p*
*/div1*
